Subject: AFTERMATH Pt 2
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=435352480; y=TY6zgYZKSjE5XKDLmCUHdHKPwTjS5EewsNR012Tz018w3NBVAxzuuw

Deep in the depths of the Earth two dark figures fell through a long
and winding shaft followed by fire and light - arcing and twisting. If
there was a casual observer here in these dark and unknown places it
would look like two dolls made of iron and steel bouncing  and
clanging in the dense darkness.

That is until both of them fell through the air and then splashed into
pitch black waters, steam rising from the once placid surface.

Finally dark forms rose from the waters and stumbled onto land, one
larger than the other.

"It is you!" The smaller of the two forms said, fear in his voice.

There was a dark chuckle from the larger of the two, "It would seem we
are both full of surprises." Lights flickered from the chest of the
larger one brightening the room for a moment and revealing his dark
chassis and scarred visage - it was NEMESIS PRIME.

He looked down at the other dark figure, even in this light he was
still black and silver loking almost exactly like the old RODIMUS
PRIME save for the color. It was DARK RODIMUS!

"I believe you have moved on from being the twin of that Maximal do
gooder." NEMESIS said. "Shall I call you by his moniker?"

The dark figure nodded and smiled darkly, "No, call me Bane, for that
is what I shall be."

NEMESIS nodded, "We will have to work together to get out of here."

There was a pause from BANE and then he looked one way and then the
other. "That way." he said as if some internal voice were speaking to
him.

NEMESIS nodded and then both figures transformed into vehicular mode
and began traveling along the side of the underground waters.

(TBC)
